title: If I want to write a movie then what things should I take care of? - Quora
tags: Take Care of My Cat (2001 movie)

response.answer_text: If you wish to write for a movie, then plan yourself you write a beautiful and a well structured script. Script matters a lot for making a movie. Get to read many free scripts in online and read some books on it. Draft some short film scripts and try to shoot it. Once your confidence level boosts up.. Write a full length feature film script.
